author: Jenna Rosenstein
title: Kylie Jenner Highlighter - Kylie Cosmetics Kylighter Highlighter
text:
It was only a matter of time before Kylie Jenner launched her own highlighter (considering she filed the trademark ages ago). On her Snapchat, the beauty mogul gave a sneak peek of the new Kylie Cosmetics Kylighter, which officially drops on February 28 at 3 p.m. PST.
SHE DOES IT AGAIN! ðŸ˜± KYLIGHTERS LAUNCHING FEB.28th AT 3pm pst!!! Tune into Kylie's Snapchat right now!
A post shared by Kylie Cosmetics (@kyliecosmetics) on Feb 22, 2017 at 10:30am PST
 There are six shades in the Kylighter collection: Banana Split, French Vanilla, Salted Caramel (Jenner's favorite), Cotton Candy (Jenner's other favorite), Chocolate Cherry, and Strawberry Cheesecake. Each shade looks insanely glitteryâ€“basically, these are not highlighters for the shine-adverse. Though she noted that you can wear whatever shade you want, the range of six means you can find one to work on all skin tonesâ€”from fair to deep.
